about.description: Full Stack Developer skilled in building scalable, user-centric web applications using modern technologies. With hands-on experience in frontend and backend development, I specialize in creating seamless UI/UX, robust APIs, and deploying production-ready applications. Passionate about learning and contributing to impactful software solutions.

experience.description: Revamped login flow, authentication, and UI for Robosensy; improved API performance by 30%. Developed role-based routing, invoice/medicine management, and a feature-rich admin dashboard. Managed deployments using AWS EC2 and Docker, and implemented CI/CD pipelines. Built scalable features using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS.
Improved UI/UX for key modules, reducing page load time by 25%. Increased user engagement by 20%. Collaborated with design and backend teams to accelerate delivery by 15%.
Delivered custom frontend dashboards and backend APIs for clients using the MERN stack. Successfully completed 3+ projects with 5-star ratings and positive client feedback.

projects.name: Inventory Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive inventory management application built using the Nextjs stack. Features include role-based access control, real-time inventory updates, and detailed analytics dashboard for administrators.

projects.name: Share-Prompt
projects.description: A modern AI prompt-sharing platform built with Next.js featuring secure authentication via NextAuth. Users can create, explore, save, and share AI prompts with a clean, intuitive interface and real-time updates.

projects.name: Travel-Buddy
projects.description: A comprehensive travel web application featuring real-time geolocation services, trip sharing capabilities, and secure JWT-based authentication with Google One Tap Login integration for seamless user experience.

projects.name: Doc-Connect
projects.description: A modern doctor appointment booking system with comprehensive doctor listings, streamlined booking flow, patient management, and integrated Strapi CMS for efficient content management and administration.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, project tracking, deadline management, and intuitive drag-and-drop interface for enhanced productivity.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Showcases skills, projects, and resume with interactive animations and dark mode support.

achievements.title: MERN Stack Full-Stack Development Certification
achievements.description: Completed hands-on course focusing on MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js for real-world web development.

achievements.title: Team Lead - E-Governance Internship
achievements.description: Led a 4-member team to successfully deliver core MERN stack modules for digitizing public services.
